alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Scott County; Northwest Yell County; Yell Excluding Northwest (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Scott and west central Yell Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 500 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Stonehouse Recreation Area, or 11 miles west of Danville, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stonehouse Recreation Area... Gravelly... Waltreak... Bluffton... Blue Ball... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Scott County; Northwest Yell County; Yell Excluding Northwest
